definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: ascend (loan-word from Aram. [[סְלֵיק]], sleq; Palm. [[סלק]] id., Lzb:329 Cook:85; NH [[סלק]] Pi. remove; Ar. salaqa ascend, Lane:1410 (also loan-word ?));—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 S. [[אֶסַּק]] Ps 139:8 if I ascend to heaven ([[שָׁמַיִם]] ), thou art there (on form, = …[[אֶסְלַק]], v. Ges:§ 66 e Kö:i. 301 Kau:§ 44).
